page.title: 20ATTITUDES 2
page.content: People were asked what they disliked about living in the area & replies were as follows: Many said they could not fault life in the area. Too many rich people who think they own the people as well as the land.New buildings such as the Old Orchard development were thought not to be in keeping with the traditional atmosphere of the village.No facilities for young children to play after school.No homes at a price affordable by young couples.Too much gossipping.No gas in the village.Isolation & hazardous pavements in the winter.Few buses & services.Untidy factory areas on the outskirts of the village.Fruit pickers causing a nuisance in the summer months.Noise from the music night at the bottom pub.Fox hunting.
